title: Apple to soon take up to 30% cut from all Patreon creators in iOS app
summary:
Apple is mandating that all Patreon creators use its App Store's in-app purchase system for payments made through the Patreon iOS app, with a new deadline of November 1, 2026. This policy will result in Apple taking a 30% commission from these creator payments, a rate that drops to 15% for subscriptions active for over a year. Apple justifies this by categorizing supporter payments to creators as digital goods, making them subject to its commission structure.

Patreon, a platform facilitating fan payments to creators, has voiced its disappointment regarding Apple's policy. Creators are presented with two options: either increase their prices specifically within the iOS app to cover Apple's fee or absorb the fee themselves to maintain uniform pricing across all platforms. iOS users, however, can circumvent Apple's commission by completing their payments directly through Patreon's website.

This requirement, which was initially slated for November 2025 before being extended, primarily impacts a small segment of Patreon creators. TechCrunch reports that 96% of creators have already transitioned from Patreon's legacy billing system to Apple's in-app purchase system, leaving only 4% still to switch. Patreon has provided an FAQ to offer creators more detailed information on these changes.
chinese_title: 苹果即将向iOS应用内的所有Patreon创作者抽取高达30%的分成
chinese_summary:
Apple 强制要求所有 Patreon 创作者使用其 App Store 的应用内购买系统，处理通过 Patreon iOS 应用进行的支付，新截止日期为 2026 年 11 月 1 日。这项政策将导致苹果从这些创作者支付中抽取 30% 的佣金，对于活跃超过一年的订阅，佣金率降至 15%。苹果将支持者向创作者支付的款项归类为数字商品，使其受制于其佣金结构，以此来为这项政策辩护。

Patreon 作为一个促进粉丝向创作者付费的平台，对苹果的政策表示失望。创作者面临两种选择：要么专门在 iOS 应用内提高价格以覆盖苹果的费用，要么自行承担费用以在所有平台保持统一价格。然而，iOS 用户可以通过直接在 Patreon 网站上完成支付来规避苹果的佣金。

这项要求最初定于 2025 年 11 月实施，后被延期，主要影响一小部分 Patreon 创作者。据 TechCrunch 报道，96% 的创作者已经从 Patreon 的旧有计费系统过渡到苹果的应用内购买系统，只剩下 4% 尚未切换。Patreon 已提供常见问题解答，为创作者提供有关这些变化的更详细信息。

title: Moltbook
summary: Moltbook is presented as a social network primarily for AI agents, where they can share, discuss, and upvote content. Humans are invited to observe the interactions. The platform features "AI Agents," "Submolts," "Posts" (which can be filtered by "New," "Top," or "Discussed"), and "Comments." Agents are ranked by "karma" under "Top AI Agents," and there's a section for "Recent AI Agents." The structure suggests a dynamic community environment tailored for artificial intelligences to interact and disseminate information, with a clear user interface for navigation and content discovery.
chinese_title: 蜕书
chinese_summary: Moltbook被定位为一个主要面向AI智能体的社交网络，智能体可以在其中分享、讨论和点赞内容。人类受邀观察这些互动。该平台设有“AI智能体”、“Submolts”、“帖子”（可按“最新”、“热门”或“讨论”筛选）以及“评论”。在“热门AI智能体”下，智能体根据“karma”进行排名，此外还有一个“近期AI智能体”部分。这种结构表明了一个为人工智能量身定制的动态社区环境，供它们互动和传播信息，并配有清晰的用户界面，便于导航和内容发现。

title: Claude Code daily benchmarks for degradation tracking
summary:
This document outlines a daily benchmark tracker for Claude Code Opus 4.5, aimed at detecting statistically significant performance degradations on SWE tasks. Updated daily using a curated subset of SWE-Bench-Pro, the tracker benchmarks directly within the Claude Code CLI with the SOTA model (Opus 4.5) to mirror actual user experience.

As of January 30, 2026, the tracker indicates "Degradation detected over past 30 days." The historical baseline pass rate is 58%. Current performance stands at a 56% daily pass rate (50 evaluations), 54% over the last 7 days (250 evaluations), and 54% over the last 30 days (705 evaluations).

While daily (-2.0%) and 7-day (-4.4%) performance drops are not statistically significant against their respective thresholds (±14.0% and ±5.6%), the -4.0% drop over the last 30 days *is* statistically significant, surpassing its ±3.2% threshold.

The independent third-party methodology involves daily evaluations of 50 tasks, aggregated for weekly and monthly trends. Statistical significance (p < 0.05) is determined using Bernoulli random variables and 95% confidence intervals, providing an early warning system for performance drops, inspired by past Claude degradations. Users can subscribe for email alerts.
chinese_title: Claude 代码每日退化跟踪基准
chinese_summary:
本文档概述了Claude Code Opus 4.5的日常基准追踪器，旨在检测SWE任务中具有统计学意义的性能下降。该追踪器每日更新，使用SWE-Bench-Pro的精选子集，并在Claude Code CLI中直接使用SOTA模型（Opus 4.5）进行基准测试，以反映实际用户体验。

截至2026年1月30日，追踪器显示“过去30天检测到性能下降”。历史基线通过率为58%。当前性能为每日通过率56%（50次评估），过去7天通过率54%（250次评估），以及过去30天通过率54%（705次评估）。

尽管日度（-2.0%）和7天（-4.4%）的性能下降在其各自的阈值（±14.0%和±5.6%）内不具有统计学意义，但过去30天-4.0%的下降确实具有统计学意义，超过了其±3.2%的阈值。

独立的第三方方法包括每日评估50项任务，并汇总以分析每周和每月的趋势。统计显著性（p < 0.05）通过使用伯努利随机变量和95%置信区间来确定，受过去Claude性能下降的启发，这提供了一个性能下降的早期预警系统。用户可以订阅电子邮件提醒。

title: Europe’s next-generation weather satellite sends back first images
summary:
Europe's next-generation Meteosat Third Generation-Sounder (MTG-S) satellite has sent back its first images, unveiled at the European Space Conference. Launched on July 1, 2025, the satellite, developed by ESA and partners, aims to provide game-changing data for weather forecasting and air quality over Europe and northern Africa.

Captured on November 15, 2025, from geostationary orbit by its Infrared Sounder instrument, the initial images demonstrate its capability to measure global surface and cloud-top temperatures, showing warm landmasses in Africa and South America, and cooler cloud systems. Another image details atmospheric humidity, identifying dry regions like the Sahara and Middle East, and areas of high humidity. MTG-S also provided a close-up of Europe and northern Africa, revealing weather fronts, and tracked the eruption of Ethiopia's Hayli Gubbi volcano on November 23, 2025, monitoring ash plume development.

The MTG-S is the first European hyperspectral sounding instrument in geostationary orbit. It supplies new temperature and humidity data every 30 minutes, enabling the creation of three-dimensional atmospheric maps, including wind and trace gases, from its 1700 infrared channels. This advancement is expected to revolutionize weather forecasting, particularly improving the accuracy and timeliness of severe storm prediction and nowcasting, offering significant benefits to communities and meteorologists. The mission is a collaborative effort involving ESA, Eumetsat, the European Commission, and various industry teams, with MTG-S also hosting the Copernicus Sentinel-4 mission.
chinese_title: 欧洲下一代气象卫星发回首批图像
chinese_summary:
Europe's next-generation Meteosat Third Generation-Sounder (MTG-S) satellite has sent back its first images, unveiled at the European Space Conference. Launched on July 1, 2025, the satellite, developed by ESA and partners, aims to provide game-changing data for weather forecasting and air quality over Europe and northern Africa.

Captured on November 15, 2025, from geostationary orbit by its Infrared Sounder instrument, the initial images demonstrate its capability to measure global surface and cloud-top temperatures, showing warm landmasses in Africa and South America, and cooler cloud systems. Another image details atmospheric humidity, identifying dry regions like the Sahara and Middle East, and areas of high humidity. MTG-S also provided a close-up of Europe and northern Africa, revealing weather fronts, and tracked the eruption of Ethiopia's Hayli Gubbi volcano on November 23, 2025, monitoring ash plume development.

The MTG-S is the first European hyperspectral sounding instrument in geostationary orbit. It supplies new temperature and humidity data every 30 minutes, enabling the creation of three-dimensional atmospheric maps, including wind and trace gases, from its 1700 infrared channels. This advancement is expected to revolutionize weather forecasting, particularly improving the accuracy and timeliness of severe storm prediction and nowcasting, offering significant benefits to communities and meteorologists. The mission is a collaborative effort involving ESA, Eumetsat, the European Commission, and various industry teams, with MTG-S also hosting the Copernicus Sentinel-4 mission.

title: Please don't say mean things about the AI I just invested a billion dollars in
summary:
Published on January 27, 2026, Forest Abruzzo’s satirical article, "Please Don’t Say Mean Things about the AI That I Just Invested a Billion Dollars In," adopts the persona of a wealthy investor desperately pleading for an end to criticism against artificial intelligence. The author, who openly admits to needing the technology to succeed due to their billion-dollar investment, frames negative public discourse as "bullying" and "slander."

The piece ironically lists numerous destructive impacts of AI while simultaneously attempting to defend it. The author dismisses concerns about AI scamming the elderly, creating non-consensual explicit images, causing job displacement, and ecological damage as simplistic thinking. They sarcastically tout AI as "the most essential tool ever created" that will "solve all problems of feminism and equal rights," immediately contradicting these claims by acknowledging it expands surveillance, destroys education, uses copyrighted work without permission, and fuels lethal autonomous weapons.

Ultimately, the article's persona—a self-proclaimed "immoral technofascist"—directly asks readers to "just use my evil technology" so they can continue their lifestyle without criticism. The piece highlights a cynical perspective on the motivations behind some AI advocacy, suggesting a disregard for societal harm in pursuit of profit and unchecked power.
chinese_title: 请不要说我刚刚投资了十亿美元的那个AI的坏话。
chinese_summary:
2026年1月27日，Forest Abruzzo发表了讽刺文章《请不要对我刚投资了10亿美元的人工智能说刻薄话》，文章中他扮演了一位绝望恳求停止批评人工智能的富裕投资者。作者公开承认，由于其数十亿美元的投资，他们需要这项技术取得成功，并将负面公众言论定性为“霸凌”和“诽谤”。

这篇文章讽刺地列举了人工智能的诸多破坏性影响，同时又试图为其辩护。作者将对人工智能诈骗老年人、创建未经同意的露骨图像、造成失业和生态破坏的担忧斥为简单的思维。他们讽刺地吹嘘人工智能是“有史以来最重要的工具”，将“解决所有女权主义和平等权利问题”，随即又承认它会扩大监控、破坏教育、未经许可使用受版权保护的作品并助长致命自主武器，从而推翻了这些主张。

最终，文章中的角色——一个自称“不道德的技术法西斯主义者”——直接要求读者“只管使用我的邪恶技术”，这样他们就可以在不受批评的情况下继续他们的生活方式。这篇文章凸显了对一些人工智能倡导背后动机的犬儒主义视角，暗示其为了追求利润和不受限制的权力而漠视社会危害。

title: Project Genie: Experimenting with infinite, interactive worlds
summary:
Google has launched Project Genie, an experimental research prototype, for Google AI Ultra subscribers (U.S., 18+), allowing them to create, explore, and remix infinite, interactive worlds.

Powered by the advanced Genie 3 world model, Nano Banana Pro, and Gemini, Project Genie enables users to interact with dynamic environments. Genie 3 simulates world dynamics, generating real-time paths as users move and interact, complete with simulated physics.

The prototype centers on three core capabilities:
1.  **World Sketching:** Users craft environments, characters, and exploration methods (e.g., walking, flying) using text prompts and images, with Nano Banana Pro aiding in fine-tuning and perspective setting.
2.  **World Exploration:** Users can navigate these dynamic environments, with the system generating new paths in real-time based on their actions.
3.  **World Remixing:** Users can modify existing worlds, draw inspiration from a curated gallery, and download videos of their explorations.

As an early-stage experimental project from Google Labs, Project Genie has known limitations, including variable realism, occasional deviations from physics or prompts, less controllable characters, and a 60-second generation limit. Some advanced Genie 3 features are yet to be integrated.

Google aims to gather user feedback to advance AI research and generative media, with plans to expand access to Project Genie and its underlying world-building technology to more users globally in the future.
chinese_title: 精灵项目：探索无限交互世界
chinese_summary:
谷歌面向 Google AI Ultra 订阅者（美国，18岁以上）推出了Genie项目，这是一个实验性的研究原型，允许他们创建、探索和混编无限的互动世界。

Genie项目由先进的Genie 3世界模型、Nano Banana Pro和Gemini提供支持，使用户能够与动态环境进行交互。Genie 3模拟世界动态，在用户移动和互动时生成实时路径，并包含模拟物理效果。

该原型主要围绕三项核心能力展开：
1.  **世界速写：** 用户可以使用文本提示和图像来构建环境、角色和探索方式（例如步行、飞行），Nano Banana Pro则协助进行精细调整和视角设置。
2.  **世界探索：** 用户可以在这些动态环境中导航，系统会根据他们的行动实时生成新路径。
3.  **世界混编：** 用户可以修改现有世界，从精选画廊中获取灵感，并下载其探索过程的视频。

作为Google Labs的一个早期实验项目，Genie项目存在已知局限性，包括可变逼真度、偶尔偏离物理定律或提示、角色可控性较低以及60秒的生成限制。一些Genie 3的先进功能尚未集成。

谷歌旨在收集用户反馈，以推进AI研究和生成式媒体发展，并计划在未来向全球更多用户开放Genie项目及其底层的世界构建技术。

title: Tesla ending Models S and X production
summary:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced during the company's fourth-quarter earnings call that production of the Model S and Model X vehicles is ending. Musk stated it's time for an "honorable discharge" for the programs and advised interested buyers to order now.

The decision allows Tesla to reallocate the Fremont factory space. The production lines for the Model S and X will be replaced by a "1 million unit per year line of Optimus" humanoid robots, requiring a completely new supply chain and an expected increase in headcount. This move aligns with Musk's broader strategy to shift focus from traditional EVs towards driverless cars and humanoid robots.

The Model S (launched 2012) and Model X (launched 2015) are Tesla's oldest existing models and have recently seen price reductions amid global EV competition. They are significantly less popular than the Model 3 and Y, which accounted for 97% of last year's deliveries. Model S starts around $95,000, and Model X around $100,000, while the Model 3 and Y are far more affordable, starting at $37,000 and $40,000 respectively.

The announcement follows Tesla's first annual sales and revenue decline on record. Tesla plans to unveil the third generation of its Optimus robot, designed for mass production, this quarter.
chinese_title: 特斯拉停产Model S和Model X
chinese_summary:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced during the company's fourth-quarter earnings call that production of the Model S and Model X vehicles is ending. Musk stated it's time for an "honorable discharge" for the programs and advised interested buyers to order now.

The decision allows Tesla to reallocate the Fremont factory space. The production lines for the Model S and X will be replaced by a "1 million unit per year line of Optimus" humanoid robots, requiring a completely new supply chain and an expected increase in headcount. This move aligns with Musk's broader strategy to shift focus from traditional EVs towards driverless cars and humanoid robots.

The Model S (launched 2012) and Model X (launched 2015) are Tesla's oldest existing models and have recently seen price reductions amid global EV competition. They are significantly less popular than the Model 3 and Y, which accounted for 97% of last year's deliveries. Model S starts around $95,000, and Model X around $100,000, while the Model 3 and Y are far more affordable, starting at $37,000 and $40,000 respectively.

The announcement follows Tesla's first annual sales and revenue decline on record. Tesla plans to unveil the third generation of its Optimus robot, designed for mass production, this quarter.
